high_descs: Walk to the right side of the desk.
Grab the CD from the desk.
Locate the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Look at a CD under a lamp's light.

high_descs: Go to the right end of the wooden desk in front of you.
Pick up the disc on the desk.
Turn right and then turn back to the desk.
Turn on the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Pick up the disc and turn on the lamp on the desk.

high_descs: Head to the right side of the desk
Take the CD from the desk
Take a step to the right
anns.task_desc: Take the CD from the desk, turn on the lamp
